      • saveResponse

        @PostMapping("/saveResponse")
public java.lang.String saveResponse​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                     org.springframework.ui.Model theModel,
                                     @RequestParam(name="questionnaireId")
                                     java.lang.String questionnaireId,
                                     @Valid @ModelAttribute("responses")
                                     @Valid ResponsesViewModel theResponses,
                                     org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result,
                                     org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
        Saving responses to database
        Parameters:
        theModel - Model passed to view
        request - Http Request to get parameters from view
        questionnaireId - Parameter received from previous view
        theResponses - Model of wrapper class include passed list of responses
        result - Check is valid of binding
        redirectAttributes - Redirecting attributes to view
        Returns:
        If binding has errors, return to previous view with errors, otherwise return Questionnaires view
        Since:
        2020-06-03

        theModel - Model passed to view
        request - Http Request to get parameters from view
